testcase.name: Check the logout link
testcase.system-out: Given The user open the login page..........................................passed When The user enter a valid username "s.mahallel99@gmail.com"...............passed And The user enter a valid password "123456789a"............................passed And The user check the remeber me check box.................................passed And The user click on submit button.........................................passed Then The system should redirect to the dashboard page with the title "ACME System 1 - Dashboard".passed When The user clicks on the logout link.....................................passed Then The system sign out....................................................passed And The system redirect to the login page with the title "ACME System 1 - Log In".passed
